quote: A man can succeed at almost anything for which he has unlimited enthusiasm
author: Charles Schwab

quote: The future depends on what you do today
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore
author: André Gide

quote: Whether you think you can or you think you can’t, you’re right
author: Henry Ford

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t found it yet, keep looking. Don’t settle
author: Steve Jobs

quote: There is no passion to be found playing small — in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door
author: Milton Berle

quote: If you're offered a seat on a rocket ship, don't ask what seat! Just get on
author: Sheryl Sandberg

quote: If it scares you, it might be a good thing to try
author: Seth Godin

quote: The worst days of those who enjoy what they do, are better than the best days of those who don’t
author: Jim Rohn

quote: A mind that is stretched by new experiences can never go back to its old dimensions
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Jr.

quote: There is only one way to avoid criticism: Do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing
author: Aristotle

quote: The best way to predict the future is to create it
author: Abraham Lincoln

quote: You miss 100 percent of the shots you never take
author: Wayne Gretzky

quote: The best thing you can do is the right thing; the next best thing you can do is the wrong thing; the worst thing you can do is nothing
author: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Insist on yourself. Never imitate
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Whatever you decide to do, make sure it makes you happy
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does
author: William James

quote: Take risks. If you win, you will be happy. If you lose, you will be wise
author: Anonymous

quote: Nobody in life gets exactly what they thought they were going to get. But if you work really hard and you're kind, amazing things will happen
author: Conan O'Brien
